strings.EEAmetadata.title: Metadata
strings.EEAPublicationDateMustBeEqualOrAfterCrea: Publication date MUST be equal or after creation date.
strings.EEAPublicationDateIsEqualOrAfterCreation: Publication date is equal or after creation date.
strings.EEAparentIdentifier.report: If record is part of serie, use the parent identifier to link between a dataset metadata and the metadata of a dataset of which the former is a subset (e.g. datasets within a series, public versions which are subsets of internal versions without restricted data).
strings.EEAsource.report: If record is derived from another, the source element allows the logical link between a dataset metadata and the metadata of the corresponding source dataset(s).

EEASRS.alert.div: The Coordinate Reference System shall be referred to with its EPSG code

strings.EEAPUBDATE.alert: Publication date is not defined for a dataset published on EEA website at URL:
strings.EEAPUBDATE.report: Publication date of the dataset on EEA website is
strings.EEAEDITION.alert: Revision number in data directory does not match dataset edition.
strings.EEAEDITION.report: Dataset edition (also found in directory name) is
strings.EEAABSTRACT.report: The dataset is described by an abstract.
strings.EEAPOC.alert: The responsible party acting as point of contact is not described.
strings.EEAPOC.report: The dataset point of contact is described.
strings.EEACUSTODIAN.alert: The responsible party acting as custodian is not described and is required for EEA datasets.
strings.EEA_UP_FREQ.alert: Update frequency is required for a dataset with a revision number.
strings.EEA_UP_FREQ.report: Dataset (with an edition number) update frequency is
strings.EEA_KEYWORD_GEMET.alert: There shall be more than one keyword from GEMET (3 or 4 is even better).
strings.EEA_KEYWORD_Regions.alert: There shall be more than one keyword describing the spatial coverage.
strings.EEA_KEYWORD_EEA.alert: There shall be one keyword from EEA keywords
strings.EEA_CATEGORY.alert: There shall be one EEA category.
strings.EEA_SPATIAL_TYPE.report: The dataset spatial representation type is
strings.EEA_TEMPORAL.alert: The time period covered by the content of the dataset is not described.
strings.EEA_TEMPORAL.report: The time period covered by the content of the dataset is described.
